snippet: An overloaded bus with villagers en route to sign agreements for grants to rebuild their homes ran off an unpaved road, killing and injuring dozens....
abstract: Bus carrying villagers headed to sign agreements required to gain government grant money to help rebuild homes destroyed in Nepal earthquake crashes en route to Madan Pudari village, killing 20 and injuring 38; accident adds to horrors faced by those in midst of earthquake recovery.

byline.original: By KAI SCHULTZ and RAJNEESH BHANDARI
byline.contributor: Rick Gladstone contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: An overloaded bus with villagers en route to sign agreements for grants to rebuild their homes ran off an unpaved road, killing and injuring dozens.

headline.main: Bus of Nepal Earthquake Survivors Plunges Off a Road, Killing 27
headline.print_headline: Tragedy Strikes Twice for Survivors of 2015 Nepal Earthquake
